Lineages & Dynasties

Noble Families

From the gold-rich Goldhelms to the ancient Ipadoraâ€”bloodlines are the truest currency of power in Eldunary.

family

Darkmane Family

The oldest Darkmane lineage. No formal throne â€” the Realm has no central government. Vaelith the Hollow and Azaraith are the two most powerful members. Their relationship defines the Darkmane Realm's political future.

View Entry â†’
family

Goldhelm Family

The ruling family of the Goldhelm Kingdom. King Aldric governs with absolute isolationist policy. Princess Seraphina is heir and likely agent of change. The family's internal generational disagreement is the most consequential domestic tension in Goldhelm.

View Entry â†’
family

Ipadora Family

The ruling family of the Ipadora Kingdom. Queen Nayele is current head. Governs Ipadora Sanctuary (direct) and Glaril (through branch faction). Rabuka is a distant family member who became Arashi Rank #4.
